# wandelbots-api-client
Interact with robots in an easy and intuitive way.

- Compatible API version: 1.0.0 beta (can be found at the homescreen of your instance -> API)
- Package version: 0.0.1

The documentation can be found here: [https://docs.wandelbots.io/docs/api-quickstart/python-package](https://docs.wandelbots.io/docs/api-quickstart/python-package)

For more information, please visit [https://www.wandelbots.com](https://www.wandelbots.com)

## Requirements.
Python >=3.9, Python < 4.0

## Installation
```
pip install wandelbots-api-client
```

OR

pyproject.toml:
```
[tool.poetry.dependencies]
wandelbots-api-client = "*"
```
